perimeter_locations: Calle San Francisco (main entrance): Divert traffic using cones or barriers to create a safe zone.
Calle de las Cortes: Block the street at both ends to prevent access from adjacent areas.
Paseo del Puerto: Establish a secondary perimeter to control pedestrian traffic and prevent congestion near the waterway.
Plaza de la Constitución: Position officers here to monitor traffic flow and provide support as needed.
action_details: Deploy 5 police officers to manage traffic near Calle San Francisco in Cádiz, Spain. Their tasks will include diverting traffic away from the emergency area, providing crowd control, and maintaining order. Officers should arrive at the scene as soon as possible, considering the high estimated severity of the fire, to ensure public safety.
